pullrequest.title: Fix cleanup of visual with plugins that have callbacks

content.raw: I noticed that you made a lot of changes from `NULL` to `nullptr`. I also switched the test expectations in `Visual_TEST` away from true/false assertions like `ASSERT_TRUE(x != nullptr)` to ==/!= assertions like `ASSERT_NE(x, nullptr)`. It's in 5bbc48a07b72 (branch `issue_2047_scpeters`) if you're interested.
content.html: I noticed that you made a lot of changes from NULL to nullptr. I also switched the test expectations in Visual_TEST away from true/false assertions like ASSERT_TRUE(x != nullptr) to ==/!= assertions like ASSERT_NE(x, nullptr). It's in 5bbc48a07b72 (branch issue_2047_scpeters) if you're interested.
